summary: An ordinance amending Section 1 of Ordinance No. 45447, entitled: "An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of West 85th Street and North 85th Street, between 24th Avenue Northwest and Meridian Avenue, all in the City of Seattle; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of lands and other property necessary therefor, and providing that the entire cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law", approved July 12, 1923, and providing for the laying off, opening, extending and establishing of Stroud Avenue from Stroud Avenue as deeded under Ordinance No. 16470, to North 85th Street, under said Ordinance No. 45447, and declaring an emergency.
